Joe Banner . Joe Banner talked about what the Eagles' offseason approach will be. "Our view is really no different than what you see going around the league," Joe Banner said. With the unknown of the collective barganining agreement, we've decided- and everybody can make their own decision- that it's safer to wait, be patient, let's see what the landscape is and move forward. "So we don't rule out doing things, and at the same time at this point, we haven't done anything, and it's overwhelmingly related to just kind of the uncertainty of where things are headed. Two of the Eagles' main offseason decisions pertain to Michael Vick and DeSean Jackson .
